QuestData.Title: Thinning The Pack
QuestData.Description: The past few seasons have been plentiful, and as a result, the wild tiger population on Windward Isle has exploded.$B$BThe savage creatures have hunted out all the nearby game, and are beginning to encroach upon the cloud serpent nests.$B$BAs a result, as the tigers thrive, the cloud serpents decline.$B$BIf we are not careful, the predatory cats could completely wipe them out.$B$BWe must thin the tigers' numbers, $r.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Windward Tigers or Windward Alphas.
